name: tcbuild.vim
summary: syntax of buildinfo file of TCbuild (build tool for Fortran)
description: Define the syntax (keywords and comments) for the buildinfo file of TCbuild, a new build tool for Fortran.
install_details:
Place tcbuild.vim file in ~/.vim/syntax/ folder.

You may want to make vim autodetect it by having this in your ~/.vimrc :
autocmd BufRead,BufNewFile buildinfo set filetype=tcbuild
